website_summaries.verdict: The Urbanears Plattan headphones are all about style, which unfortunately doesn't leave much room for great sound in this case. Beware of mushy bass, nasally mids, and an absence of clarity.
pros: The Urbanears Plattan headphones are inexpensive and come in a vast array of color options
They're also compact and stylish, and will work with music phones thanks to an integrated mic and call answer button
cons: The Plattan headphones aren't terribly comfortable and overall audio quality is muddy

customer_reviews.title: Love Urbanears on a whole
customer_reviews.text: This is our families 4th pair of Urbanears, each one a different model. Love Urbanears on a whole. These are no exception. The sound is crisp and clear when played through a Samsung Galaxy S5 streaming on Spotify on extreme quality. They sit well on my ears and are easily adjusted and are comfortable, though I have only listened to them about 15 - 20 min at a time so can't speak to longer listening times. The only ding in my books, hence the 4 stars not 5, is I would like a little more bass than is provided with this model. Other than that, great product and great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Long

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to see that these headphones were on the Amazon website for a significantly amount lower than I saw in a retail store recently. I picked up a neutral color and have been very happy with their performance. They fit very comfortable on the ear and the sound is crisp. If you are looking for headphones and don't want to shell out the money for the Beats then these are a great alternative. I use them for all of my apple products and picked up different colors for each of my kids so they know which ones are theirs. Great product for the price. I would recommend Urbanears products.
customer_reviews.author: JennEinNJ

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, love the fabric covering, great sound
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these after reading about them in Real Simple magazine. My ears are too small for the "ear bud" type headphones and the foam type ones are difficult to find and the sound in those is not so good. These are great! Sound is great and they are extremely comfortable. I use them to go running. I like that the earpieces aren't foam and aren't too tight. The fabric covering is so nice and I love that the fabric covers the cord - less likely to split or break or get tangled. They earpieces fold in so the whole thing can be tucked away in a bag or drawer easily.
customer_reviews.author: ABF

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones at a great price
customer_reviews.text: These were a big hit for my daughter's 11th birthday. The color is vivid. The ear coverings are comfortable and they are easy to adjust to fit around the head. I've seen similar styles of headphones priced all over the map. Many are much higher in price than the UbanEars. For an 11 year old to use with her ipod Touch, I just wasn't willing to pay an outrageous price. These fit the budget and made her very happy. She can listen to music, games and programming on her ipod Touch when she's in the same room as us without our having to hear it too. The came promptly and were very nicely packaged. A perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: mom with love and humor

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much junk
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much junk. Lasted less than two years even with very little use. Headphones are too small. To be effective they should cover the entire ear. These don't even come close. Audio quality also poor except under ideal [i.e. no competing noise] conditions. Under ideal conditions audio was only average with very poor highs and lows. On a transcontinental flight you'll hear more jet engine noise than dialog when watching a movie. Good headphones cost money. You generally get what you pay for and the manufacturers of this product prove that old axiom.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J. Wiles

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever.
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. They're super vibrant and unique looking. They are really good with oustide-noise-reducing/canceling. They're comfy (I mean it can be a bit snug after a few hours but I think that's all headphones.) But I do tend to have to take my earrings off when I wear them because the backs of them start jabbing me in the head. They're collapsible, which is extremely convenient. If you purchase these just take good care of them otherwise it'll be for naught that you paid $60 -- they can get dirty and the cushiony part on the actual ear pieces can start to tear if you just chuck them in your purse with everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Zebra1331

customer_reviews.title: It' okay. Not great.
customer_reviews.text: I actually like these, though they are not what I'm looking for. In my experience, the plug doesn't fit into my phone well while I'm on runs. However, the sound quality is pretty good. Though, on a run, there was a slight sprinkle rain shower and the headset did not seem to react well. Not terrible. Just okay. I'm looking for something a bit more in a headset but I cna see this being great for many.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Save your money. Urbanears warranty worthless
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased 3 pairs and every single pair has failed (plugs break off). Urbanears refuses to honor warranty as they say Amazon retailers are not authorized dealers. Even though their warranty does not say anything about this. Save your money and get another brand that stands behind their warranty. All 3 pairs lasted about 6 months. In fact bought them early April - my guess is they are overwhelmed with failures so just can't cope with warranties
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good year, and it feels worth it at the ...
customer_reviews.text: These only last about a year. It’s a good year, and it feels worth it at the time because they are pretty inexpensive, but you end up making a lot of trash having to throw these away year after year. They are really comfortable and sound nice and look nice, I just wish they would figure out the cord issue they have.
customer_reviews.author: Kate B

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as the ones sold by Apple, but still OK
customer_reviews.text: I bought the gray ones from the Apple store, but decided I wanted black. These don't have the volume buttons like the Plattan headphones from Apple, nor do they have the slightly inward facing speakers. The other ones I had were sort of angled so they pressed less against the cartilage of my ears. The headphones have a play/pause button and a mic, so I guess that's cool. They sound good though... and I love that there's a jack on the right side for daisy chaining headphones. It'll be perfect for when my daughter and I fly to Florida; We can watch a movie my iPad together
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Solid headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. I originally had them in purple, but they were stolen. I bought them in black because the purple was discontinued. They're not too big, but big enough to provide an immersive experience. Although I wish the bass was stronger, I am on the whole quite satisfied. These headphones sit well on my head, and don't give me a headache. I wear glasses, and have often had difficulty with headphones squeezing my glasses into my face - not so with these ones.
customer_reviews.author: AI

customer_reviews.title: uncomfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: I loved my last pair of UrbanEar headphones but the chord wore out so I purchased these as a replacement. The biggest issue is the headset isn't tilted to fit the shape of your head which creates a gap between the front of the the ear cups and your ears, and the band is uncomfortable. The ear cups are also much smaller than the ones on the previous pair and generally feel a lot less cushy and comfortable. The materials seem high quality and well constructed, though, and if you're going for relatively small and portable these fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Rose H

customer_reviews.title: Look good but short lifespan
customer_reviews.text: I loved the design of these but it hasn't even been 4 months and they've got a bunch of problems with them...first the covering on the jack slipped off but it didn't affect the function so it was okay. Then, I noticed the wire coming out from the outer layer of the right headphone, where it has the least stress. Now, the button and volume control has completely stopped working and something with the wiring is off so that every time my phone moves, the noise scratches. I don't know if it is possible, but I would either like my money back or a replacement pair as I'm willing to give these a second chance as it still in warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Urvi Sharma

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones, started peeling on day 3.
customer_reviews.text: The vinyl that covers the ear pads started to peel on day 3 and leaves chunks of vinyl stuck to me. Otherwise, these are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: K. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Too good to be missed
customer_reviews.text: I bought these again because I accidentally trashed the ones I had bought on a local store. I guarantee you these are awesome. Sounds are really good. They isolate A LOT of the sound; company’s Plantronics pale in comparison. Only flaw is low bass, but seriously, everything else is just worth having. Shame brand is not recognised at least for these. I don’t know about the other options they have, but with these, they just have a loyal customer.
customer_reviews.author: Andrés

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for TRAVEL
customer_reviews.text: Great ON THE EAR headphones for the price. Noise cancelling enough. If people are speaking really loud, I can hear them through it, but not to where I can understand. This is the 3rd pair that I have bought. 2 as gifts and a pair for myself. Great alternative if you don't want to shell out $100's. Love the ability for other headphones to connect to these headphones, great for the plane. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: an.GEL.ica

customer_reviews.title: Urban Ears
customer_reviews.text: These headphones come in different colors, fit very well, and are the standard jack size. If you are looking for headphones with the smaller jack, these are not the ones you need. The sound quality is very good. The over the ear fits nicely and does a great job of blocking environmental sounds giving you better music/sound quality. I have tried the more expensive headsets but I found these to give the best sound quality and the most comfortable fit. The style is very modern. The price makes the deal!
customer_reviews.author: Occasional Customer

customer_reviews.title: Balanced and precise sound on a budget
customer_reviews.text: I wanted some good sounding phones for the very diverse mix of music I listen to. I'm very happy with these. From bluegrass to techno everything sounds good and rich and precise. They are also very comfortable and the quality is evident from the moment they come out of the box. Best phones I've seen and heard at this price point and even at twice the cost (I got mine for $31). If I should ever have to replace them...I'd buy them again and pay full price ($50) without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew W Garton - Salem/Eugene

customer_reviews.title: Cute has its negatives.
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. I got it for my girlfriend for one of her bday gifts because she liked the "cuteness" and the range of different pastel colors they have. With that said, sound is meh, obviously. You're paying 30 dollars don't expect MDR quality sound. My biggest problem though is with the material they used for the outside of the headphone earpieces. It's this sticky matte plastic that attracts all different kinds of fiber. I have no idea why they chose such s*** material on the outside of the headphone. It's like they tried to get a soft matte plastic material but instead got plastic lint roller material. That is seriously what this is like.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: No audiophile...but these rock
customer_reviews.text: I am no audiophile...but these head phones are great. I was looking for a casual set of headphones that had a microphone built in for phone calls. Fabric cord is awesome...snazzy packaging...good for phone calls (noise cancelling phones make it tough to hear yourself though)...little tight on my head, but I have a big one. I can wear them about 1.5 hours before my head starts to hurt a little bit. Music sounds great through them (mostly hip hop/rap for me). No regrets here.
customer_reviews.author: RobC

customer_reviews.title: Built to Last
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones! I've had them for years now and they still work even with how abusive I am to headphones. Because the cords are cloth, they are easy to detangle. They do get uncomfortable after maybe 3 or 4 hours, but that is true with any headphones that go on the ear and not over.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors, but really love the noise canceling
customer_reviews.text: I had a purple set for the TV and wanted a different color for the computer as the monitors sit next to each other and the headphones are also next to each other. I was vey happy with the first pair, which I've had long enough it had loosened up a bit. I had forgotten how snug these headphones are when they are new. However, they are already fitting better and they work every bit as good as the first pair.
customer_reviews.author: J. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Liked them till they broke
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a replacement for broken Bose headphones (whoops). They were great, but I may have had a little too much to drink one night and accidentally jerked my leg against the cord. The cord completely snapped off at the plug and I had to dig it out of my computer's headphone jack. I was sad, as I had really liked these. Still, if they weren't strong enough to survive drunk me, they're probably not strong enough for my life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Them!!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, they're wonderful. I don't know why people have been complaining of bad bass. Every sound I want to hear (and I'm a musician) I hear in the headphones. I like the brand a lot for it being a first purchase. Plus it comes with a warranty. I plan to stick with UrbanEars from now on
customer_reviews.author: happygolovely

customer_reviews.title: Urban-friendly
customer_reviews.text: Love my new Urbanears. I use them on the street, in the gym, at work, at home, in flights, everywhere. They are comfortable, not tiring on the ears, adjustable, collapsible, fit in my bag without having to worry about them. What I also LOVE is the microphone I can use to make my iPhone conversations, and the pause/play button I can use to play/pause my iPhone music. Maybe even iPod, I didn't try. Got two pairs. One for myself, and after a test trial, one for my partner.
customer_reviews.author: E. Geva

customer_reviews.title: Good all-purpose headset
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones for the price. I stash them in my backpack and use them whenever I need to make a phone call as it isolates out the sound well and the other side can get good pickup. They make the ears a tad warm, but I'm not using them for long periods. They fold down quite compactly and I like the fact that there is little branding on them. To me, they are just nice matte black headphones, classy looking. The cable is good, doesn't tangle and everyone likes the fabric cover.
customer_reviews.author: Chuckleb

customer_reviews.title: Full sound, still portable
customer_reviews.text: This was my second pair of urban ears headphones and I just love them. They are very comfortable and quite portable for over ear headphones. I really like the input socket on one of the headphones which lets my husband plug into them when, say, we're watching something together on the iPad. We love to travel with them. And did I ever mention, they sound clear and full. Really great headphones in awesome colors for a very reasonable price...what's not to love?
customer_reviews.author: Lorien Flinn

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I bought these headphones after my bunny chew on my Panasonic white headphones. These seemed like a good option after that, I really liked the color and I was willing to pay extra, but they only lasted about a year or so, because they stopped functioning. A friend of mine also ordered them and they started breaking apart, which was kind of sad. I don't expect headphones to live forever, but just a year? Come on Urbanears, you can do better than that.
customer_reviews.author: marcemars

customer_reviews.title: Good pair of headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are a good pair of headphones and I love them, and what's not to love- they're stylish, they're comfy and I can hear the music really nicely. The only time they have ever broken on me, was only when someone else sabotaged them by cutting the cord (Sorry to say that has happened more than once). Real nice, and I recommend them, especially if you want something that is as nice as some Beats headphones without paying some of the beats price.
customer_reviews.author: I.Faculty

customer_reviews.title: you have to send to CANADA for warranty repair?????
customer_reviews.text: So these earphones worked great for about 9 months. I used them at work - and as can be expected they got a lot of use. A month or so ago, they started getting really staticy (I know that is not a word, but you get the point). I filled out a warranty request form with the company and they sent me the following email asking me to ship them to CANADA. (which will cost $20) for a $50 dollar pair of headphones. BAD DEAL!
customer_reviews.author: Rich Lebedda

customer_reviews.title: Have gotten a few compliments on them...
customer_reviews.text: Nice enough quality, time will tell if I'm too rough on my accessories. There is a little fray action happening already, but I think it's because they are just thrown in my backpack along with everything else. I do wish that they had a volume button on the knob do-hickey that lives on the cord. Other than that, no complaints. And, as with any over the ear headphones, you might have to readjust after listening for a while, but I go for hours at a stretch and can still tolerate them.
customer_reviews.author: brit

customer_reviews.title: Way better then Beats by Dre!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh. These headphones are perfect. I recently sold my Beats by Dre (Solo) because I just thought they were overrated for the sound quality. Urbanear headphones are 3 times better. I listen to a lot of rap music and r&b so I need headphones that are able to handle the bass. These produce the right sound no static or buzz noise when you play them loud. I've had these for about 40 minutes since UPS dropped them off lol and I'm in love. Buy them!
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these headphones
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these headphones. Bought these last minute before a trip to Dubai because who wants to spend 16 hours on an international flight with naked ears?! I'd had my eye on some nice wireless Beats but the price tag just wasn't justifiable to me so the hunt began for an affordable, but still stylish pair of headphones. Great sound quality given the price tag. Love the sleek, minimal design and the fact that they are collapsible really appealed to me. My only complaint would be that the ear cups (?) are a tad small and don't completely cover the ears, so wearing for long periods of time may cause slight discomfort. Overall these are a GREAT purchase.
customer_reviews.author: duh_mariel

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a lot to compare these to but the sound is contained, clear and blocks out most other noise. Fun to really hear the music. I would say I have a smallish size head and the only time these start to feel kinda tight is when I am wearing my glasses...ears start to hurt. When I have my contacts on I think I could wear the headphones all day long. Hoping, with time, they will stretch just a bit.
customer_reviews.author: justagirlfromtexas

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness on my ears
customer_reviews.text: Was seriously looking at a pair of Sony headphones but was hesitant because of price. Read several good things about these and decided to give them a shot. I absolutely love them. The sound quality is terrific. They are a little tight on the head but are becoming more comfortable as I use them more. Very stylish on the head as well. You're not going to look like a moron walking around with these on.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: headphones
customer_reviews.text: good headphones in general. the lavender color a bit more pink than i thought - i expected it to be more purplish. i saw some people complained about them being too tight but you can easily bend them a lot to fit your head, i get migraines from a lot of headphones but not these since i could make them fit really loosely on my head. it's also really convenient that you can fold them up so small to carry them around.
customer_reviews.author: becca

customer_reviews.title: My go-to budget cans for getting around.
customer_reviews.text: Love these inexpensive cans. Use them with both an iPhone and Nexus 4. Very good sound quality for riding the crappy MTA, and the mic works well too. They're very comfy for extended periods of use, and have a very small footprint, as well as being low key, so no real threat of being stolen. This is my second pair, and will buy a third if either of the other two crap out.
customer_reviews.author: Doug B

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: I live in noisy NYC, and bought these to have good sound in a very a compact headphones. They work great to listen (including hearing someone on the phone, even when I'm on a train or bus), and mic works great in quiet settings. I've had a little trouble with the mic picking up too much train noise and bothering the person on the other end of the line. This might not be due to a flaw with this headphones though. I'm not sure any mic/headset could do better on trains. Would definitely recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: 30something in NYC

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Quality and Price
customer_reviews.text: I had a previous of greys and my daughter destroyed them. Lol But I found them to be ao reliable even after a year and a half. So I decided to go with black this time. Had them about 4 months now and not a single problem so far. This brand is so underrated!!! I am very particular about sound quality and this set of cans delivers the perfect balance of treble and bass in my opinion. The response is great too and they are noise cancelling as well. I highly recommend them especially at this amazing price. Trust me they can compare with Beats Solo as well. I think these sound even better than Beats! Get them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jay-P

customer_reviews.title: we are fans
customer_reviews.text: my husband loves his headphones. He would never usually wear headphones like this but after me purchasing mine, i surprised him and purchased these for him and he loves the color, sound, he doesn't complain about tightness and he says its one of the best headphones that he has ever owned. I love urban ears in general though lol.
customer_reviews.author: Lola Lane

customer_reviews.title: Big on style, not so big on sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in 2012. Moderate usage, and only now are the earbuds starting to peel a little. Sound quality is good but I prefer UE's MEDIS in-ear buds. However I can't say these are bad, as I bought another pair in Cobalt. I think I like the idea of these headphones more than their execution.The color variety is what keeps me coming back.
customer_reviews.author: lynnex

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite travel headphone
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite travel headphone. It's on ear, but I can wear them for a fairly long time (up to 3 hours) continuously, sounds great and confortable and not heavy, so makes it noticeable on my neck when I don't have them on my ears.
customer_reviews.author: ever99

customer_reviews.title: Fold easily, decent sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use on a trip to England and Ireland and forgot to write a review! Love them and still use them. They're uncomfortable to wear with glasses so I don't wear them until I put in my contacts. I love how they fold up. The sound is good, but this comes from someone who also likes Apple's earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Amazon took them back because they are amazing and care about their customers
customer_reviews.text: They stopped working at the 45 day mark. Amazon took them back because they are amazing and care about their customers. I was really disappointed because these headphones came highly recommended. They worked fine and one day the plug would not connect into an array of jacks. I think something shorted out. I highly recommend Amazon Chat. They are lightning fast and do everything in their power to help you!
customer_reviews.author: Mishelle Smith

customer_reviews.title: GREAT sound, style and fit.
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I love the way they sound, the way they look and the way they feel on my head. Surprising noise cancelling properties from a small headphone. This is my fourth pair - not from a product defect! It seems my dog loves to chew these up - so keep away from pets!
customer_reviews.author: whoiserika

customer_reviews.title: These worked fine up until about 2 years after my purchase when ...
customer_reviews.text: These worked fine up until about 2 years after my purchase when one of the speakers quit working. The problem seems localized to the connection between the cord and the 3.5mm jack (not the speaker itself). I'm sure this is wear and tear, but for $40 I would have expected to get more use out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Death Receptor

customer_reviews.title: From America to India and Back
customer_reviews.text: I traveled to India last year and did some serious reading about getting the best gear for long international flights. These were the item I was most surprised and impressed by, they are very comfortable, not the most compact, but they pack down well. Since that trip I have taken them all over the place with me and they are still in great shape and the sound quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: the notorious e

customer_reviews.title: Very Uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these headphones when I first purchased them for a long international trip. I tried them on and thought them comfortable initially. Sadly, when I used them on the flight, after only two hours they were VERY uncomfortable. I tried adjusting them slightly, which did not help. My total flying time was 16 hours and this was very disappointing. Since I got them about a month before I left, I can no longer return them. I will be looking for a new pair--different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Gracegirl

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color!
customer_reviews.text: Would have given 5 stars but got blue instead of grey which is what I ordered. This is my second pair. This is the second time is a couple of weeks that I have gotten the wrong thing. I am keeping them but not happy with the color at all. It is a hassle to return things as I live rural . I have gray hair and not into colors. LOL
customer_reviews.author: FOXSEA

customer_reviews.text: It's been several months since I ordered these, and I apologize for the late review. However, I am glad to report that these Urbanears are lovely :) They came in the official box safe and sound as I recall and I only remember ripping it open to use the headphones right away. After more than six months, they are still intact but naturally went through wear and tear- such as the hinges on the headphones coming loose from the headphones, but I was easily able to put it back into the hole but still work fine. I love its background noise cancelling qualities and built in headphones!
customer_reviews.author: natalie

customer_reviews.title: Great earphones
customer_reviews.text: I love the color of these, though they are a much darker turquoise in reality, not the "mint" shown in the picture. Functions great with my iPod - has a button for "stop", "play', and "next" options. Also has a mic function. Might not be the greatest in comfort however; always have to take them off after too long or my ears will hurt. Still, really pretty headphones for the price, and I love the sound quality even though it doesn't have complete sound cancelling.
customer_reviews.author: mdlxh

customer_reviews.title: Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I've been considering buying these headphones for quite a while and when I finally decided I found myself in trouble: how could I pick up a color, since there was a wide and wild range? I must say, I'm very happy with the one I finally went for and I've been enjoying this product ever since. Needless to say, it arrived ahead of scheduled time, too.
customer_reviews.author: Eleonora

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: This is OK for $30 as it doesn't properly fit my ears and it is smaller than expected, and overall, looks pretty cheap. However, the sound quality is pretty good but not as loud as I would have liked it. But it's ALRIGHT not really the best.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely a great product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones based on other reviews and a suggestion from a friend. Needless to say I am incredibly pleased and would recommend these headphones to anyone in the market for headphones. The headphones themselves are very comfortable and do not irritate me while using them for extended periods of time. The sound quality also really surprised me. I did not imagine that for the price of these headphones I would experience the sound quality that these provide. If you are looking for a product that provides more bang for your buck, then these are the headphones for you!
customer_reviews.author: Zac

customer_reviews.title: Don't pass these up
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headphones and what a great price. I have had these for over two years and have never had a problem. They are great on the plane. I like to listen to my music loud and have never had a complaint from anyone sitting next to me. I love that they fold up and easily fit in my backpack. Don't pass these up, you won't be sorry
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Clapham

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, while sounding great!
customer_reviews.text: Sound is great! Rich and little to no distortion when played loud! the soft touch is nice, and the fabricated cord rarely (if ever) tangles. Im very surprised how noise cancelling it sounds even though it isn't advertised as "noise cancelling". They fit over your ears and block out a decent amount of sound.
customer_reviews.author: Xavier Renteria

customer_reviews.title: Look great, sound ok but don't last that much in one piece.
customer_reviews.text: Good sound and cool looks. Best feature by far is to be able to plug another person's earplugs and share music. Me and my wife listen music together when commuting on public transport. The ear muffles are a bit weak as the started peeling off sooner than I would have liked and ther is no way to replace them.
customer_reviews.author: Rene A. P. Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great little travel headphones. The tension on the bar is a little much and makes your ears hurt after a while, but the rope chord is cool. The headphones pop out of the frame occasionally but they're easy to put back in. They fold up nicely though I wish there was a place to wrap your chord integrated into the frame. The extra headphone jack on the cup is cool, though I never use it.
customer_reviews.author: B. R. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: My favorite still after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Bought this over two years ago and they still work like new. My absolute favorite headphones. For the great price you cant beat the quality of the sound or the product itself. Doesn't feel cheap, doesn't sound cheap, and they last longer than many other sets I've had.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great sound comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are amazing, the sounds quality and clarity are beyond what I had expected. I have had many other headsets this pair surpasses them all. When I first put them on, I couldn't believe the differencet from my old set, I was missing so much. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Dottie C

customer_reviews.title: Urbanears Plattan Headphones Black
customer_reviews.text: This was my third pair so that will tell you how much I like them. I bought the other two pairs from other stores but Amazon happened to have them on sale so I bought my third pair for my brother. Great sound, like stereo. Would recommend to anyone who listens to music on laptop or PC or stereo. First pair I bought I saw on the Wendy Williams Show. Thanks Wendy!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Dy

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones if You Don't want to spend Beats $$
customer_reviews.text: Saw these headphones going for a higher price elsewhere and decided to give Amazon a try and of course were cheaper and offered with Prime. Many reviews have complained of poor sound quality but I have not experienced it using my iPhone or iPod. Perhaps it's MP3 quality download if anything??? I've had that issue sound wise with apple headphones. Bass sounds good, treble etc. Only thing is they do fit snug. I am a female so my head is smaller and it isn't a problem for me I don't like headphones that slide off but perhaps for someone else this could be annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: They are pretty uncomfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased these before and was excited to get a new pair. These ones arrived with extremely crooked and inturned earpieces. They are pretty uncomfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to UrbanEars Plattan almost 4 years ago. They are my favorite over the ear headphones with the best bang for your buck. Amazing quality. Fantastic noise cancelling. The only negative is they can get a little uncomfortable after long use. Headaches and soreness behind the ears....
customer_reviews.author: Jess V.

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I was pleasantly surprised with the sound quality and construction of these headphones. (These do fit on the ears, not over them.) I appreciated the inclusion of an informational booklet on Urbanears, too -- it is nice to feel like you agree with a company's mission if you are using their product. It is worth noting the comfortable fit of these headphones for smaller heads like mine... Petite women may find these fit better than most products made for adults. The fabric band and cord are a real bonus. Thank you, Urbanears!
customer_reviews.author: isoula

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: If you want good head phones for a decent price these are great. They're easy to store and travel with-- very compact and don't take up much room when folded up. Overall they are pretty comfortable I wear earrings and have no problems with them being annoying because of that. however after an extended period of wearing as in several hours they sometimes get uncomfortable, but nothing too bad.
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: Oh man, these headphones are such a great value.
customer_reviews.text: Music sounds awesome and call quality is excellent. I've been using them when I commute on transit to and from work for about an hour at a time. I can use them while sitting in front of the computer at home for about a couple hours before they get uncomfortable. I will totally recommend them to friends and family
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: I love these earphones. Now I can finally hear every little whisper in a movie and obviously, there is no other way to listen to music. The sound quality is great. The seller likewise was great. The earphones came before the expected date, perfectly packaged, in perfect condition and at a good price. What on Earth more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Thankful2020

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: My little brother loved these headphones from the beginning. Great buy and Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Prince E.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: The rest of my family now wants new headphones because of these. The sound quality is great, the color choices are awesome. I did not realize the iphone/ipod controls on this model do not also control the volume (apparently that's a different model) but I do like these.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Edwards

customer_reviews.title: These fit and sound great.
customer_reviews.text: The cost of these headphones, surprisingly, is low for the sound quality. It is unfortunate I selected just one color. Their color availability would have been nice to wear a different color each day for a few weeks. They remain on for extended periods yet to not get tight or uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Foamy Mustache

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, pretty good size.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the Urbanears headphones. The sounds is great for the price and they are comfortable to wear for long periods. I wish they folded up a bit smaller - folded they are about 6x4" - but they're still great for commuting and storing in a small bag.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa L

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to get these earphones since the ones that go directly into your ear bother me. Unfortunately, they are great for about 5 minutes than they hurt my ears. I haved tried to make them wider and loosen them up but nothing works. These earphones are not for me. Bonnie Dreyer
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Great sound. Would order from this seller again
customer_reviews.text: Item as described. Timely shipping. Great sound. Would order from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Hollencia

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I wear these at work in my office because the walls are so thin and I don't want to disturb anyone with my music. They fit great, have great sound quality and they keep the noise in. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: L. R. Miller

customer_reviews.title: I love UrbanEars. They are worth the price and honestly
customer_reviews.text: I love UrbanEars. They are worth the price and honestly, I feel like the sound quality is better than the beats headphones. I buy from Amazon because they tend to be cheaper depending on the color. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: I.Faculty

customer_reviews.title: This is my second pair and I love them. Great sound and I'd even say a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair and I love them. Great sound and I'd even say a noticeable noise reduction. For that reason, I wear them on flights, even when I'm not listening to music. Very comfortable, by the way. Conservatively stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Foxone

customer_reviews.title: Love the color, love the sounds, just a bit pinchy.
customer_reviews.text: I finally replaced my lovely jade green pair of head phones with this lovely bright red pair. I bought these for $30 :D, 1/2 the price of the original price. I love the color options this company makes! They are unique and very vibrant. I used to own the jade green pair and loved it then too (lost it shortly after purchase). My only issue is that I can't wear these headphones for more than an hour or hour and a half at a time because it tends to pinch your ears.
customer_reviews.author: #HXNNXH

customer_reviews.title: Ouch:(
customer_reviews.text: Maybe my head is too big or something, but these seriously hurt my ears! I was looking for some comfy headphones for studying and I couldn't keep them on for more than a couple hours.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Coates

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Sheik
customer_reviews.text: I definately think this is one awesome looking pair of headphones. They appear to be of excellent to very good quality construction. I find the extra port for sharing music convienient. They are comfortable and they fold up nicely. The cord doesn't tangle. The only minor problem is that I think the bass frequencies are a tad lacking. You may need to look elsewhere if your looking for killer bass, these just don't handle dubstep and rap as insanely as I'd perfer. Hope this helps, overall you won't be dissatisfied though. I wasn't and it's been about two months since I purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: Jed

customer_reviews.title: Im enjoying the headphones
customer_reviews.text: It has been a few months since I purchased the lavender urbanears. I really like them. They are comfortable, the wire do not get in the way and it stores well. The only issue is that it will get dirty fast so I am extra careful since the headphones are light. I guess the only way to clean them is a spot clean. The sound is great and it tunes me out of any noise around me
customer_reviews.author: Karima S.B

customer_reviews.title: Not happy...
customer_reviews.text: The only positive thing is that it came on time. First of all I was a bit upset that it didn't come in the UrbanEars box. It was just thrown in a mailing cardboard box. Secondly the Indigo color I saw online is so much more darker and richer color than the one I received. The color I got is a grayish color and it looks used! The only reason I was comfortable buying this brand is because I own a pair (bought from apple store a few years back) and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Fatima

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, great price, a little uncomfy for extended wear
customer_reviews.text: I really love the sound on these! I used to never listen to music while traveling because I can't stand my laptop speakers; but these have really helped. The built in mic is good enough quality for phone calls; and works for in-a-pinch podcast recording. Also, the way they fold up nice and tiny means they fit perfect in my carry-around bag. Woohoo! Sadly, the way these fit my ears is a little awkward, and wearing them for more than a couple hours in a coffee shop eventually makes me need to take them off.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Spencer

customer_reviews.title: terrible
customer_reviews.text: right out the box the jack had a short in it that cut out the audio when you touched it and then still on my head, i hadn't taken it off once, the right cup cut out and stopped working. sound only comes out of the left one. i dont know if its the sellers fault but ive read reviews online that these were supposed to be super durable but obviously this was not true in my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Zillah

customer_reviews.title: Cool headphones
customer_reviews.text: We got the blue ones. They actually look almost like a dark grey but my son loves them anyway. He was going for the cool factor and he feels like he achieved that. Sorry, but I have no idea how good the sound is. It must be good enough because he hasn't complained about it.
customer_reviews.author: OC mana

customer_reviews.title: Good pair of cans
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my friend as a gift, who doesn't really care about sound, but just wants to look cool, but they were delivered late and he left the state before they arrived. So I don't really have any use for them now so I will be sending them back. I could always mail it to him, but that would be more money and I wanted to see the reaction on his face. All of that aside, I did listen to them to see if I might keep them to myself and they sound nice and all, but don't really compare to the Audio Technica M50s that I have. They are good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: awesome headphones but if you have an older device like an ipod 4 like me, than you will have to use the INCLUDED adapter to standard 3.5. If not, than there will be interference/static noise. But that doesnt make a difference the only thing is that the microphone and play/pause button doesnt work with the adapter attatched, but its fine, trust me you dont need it. AWESOME HEADPHONES
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good headphones
customer_reviews.text: When I received my headphones I was really impressed and I love the color. So far they have held up really well and I'm happy with my purchase. However,like many other reviewers stated, they do tend to bother your ears after long periods of wear but overall I don't mind it too much. So far it has been one of the best headphones I have had in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: C.B.

customer_reviews.title: Cable as it bends barely stops the music.
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat the cable when you barely bend it, it stops the flow of the music. I've been owning a few colors of this headphone and this is the first time it happened. But overall, still usable and will recommend for gift and everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Locsin

customer_reviews.title: and a great purchase for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for college and they will do the job. They're a little snug on my ears, but with that said, my ears stick out a little bit. Very cute headphones, and a great purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Settimo

customer_reviews.title: great headphones- color not as shown
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd set of headphones- got one for my son for Christmas and this set was for my younger son. The set I purchased this time was called 'indigo' but on photo appeared to be a teal blue. We got them and they were a faded navy . We kept them anyway even though color seemed off. They are great quality besides the color!
customer_reviews.author: RI MOM

customer_reviews.title: Looking good but not really comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: First of all these Headphones were my first over the ear ones and when they arrived they were really lokking pretty decent. A So I started using them for hours straight. But after a while I started using my in-ears again because no matter what I did, after about an hour of listening to music, my ears started to hurt which was pretty annoying. So I bought some Beats Solo and I'm really happy with those headphones now because in my oppinion the sound is awesome, they are lokking good and even after listening to music for 5-6 hours straight my ears barely hurt at all.
customer_reviews.author: TheShaddow

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones with Mic
customer_reviews.text: Great Headphones which blocks out noise and allows you to hear the full spectrum of Music and also allows you to take phone calls when you use these with an iPhone or Android phone.
customer_reviews.author: Skip Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a few months
customer_reviews.text: I have bought another set of these headphones before that lasted a long time (even a year after I destroyed the cord with a vacuum cleaner), but these ones stopped working after a few months. Some of the layers of sound don't come out, so I can only hear the background and not the singing. Even before that the sound would sometimes skip even right after I bought them. I'm pretty bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan F.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality for the price. Grabbed a pair for 20$ and couldn't be happier. This is my second set. Do not expect to have the best sound or quality ever. You get what you pay, but I doubt you can get better for this price. Mine was labeled as damaged package but product came in mint condition. Looked like right off from the shelf. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are cute, but they hurt after a little ...
customer_reviews.text: They are cute, but they hurt after a little while of wearing as they are small. I have a little head, so when I say they are small, they are SMALL, lol.
customer_reviews.author: You CheatCustomers

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome headphones. Great material and great sound. I was a little skeptical about the quality because of the low cost compared to other headphones, but after using them I feel that this is a great buy. There is some pressure put on your ears and it can become uncomfortable after about 20-30 minutes, but I found that if I put them on where it felt the most comfy and left them alone, I did not feel the pressure at all. -PROS -cheap -great sound quality -comfortable earmuffs -CONS -pressure put on ears can sometimes hurt (do not be afraid of this though, it is not too bad)
customer_reviews.author: KP Midshipman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice sound and nice fit. Not completely sound blocking, but good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS

customer_reviews.title: Urbanears plattan is a great headphones my only problem is that it stop working ...
customer_reviews.text: Urbanears plattan is a great headphones my only problem is that it stop working after 5 month of light to moderate use.
customer_reviews.author: chasi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome ear phones
customer_reviews.text: Awesome ear phones. I had a pair before and I loved them but the speaker on one side blew out. The sound quality is great for the price and you can plug someone else's earphones into your own headphones. I bought mine used so unfortunately it didn't come with the splitter that usually comes with an unopened box.
customer_reviews.author: Kandice C.
